name: Tiny Tennis
description:
Tiny Striker: World Football available NOW: http://m.onelink.me/1df54446

Tiny Sports games now have over 2 MILLION downloads!! <3

Move your player to hit oncoming tennis balls and avoid flying water bottles.

HOW TO PLAY
------------
● Slide your finger to move your tiny player to hit tennis balls
● Avoid flying red water bottles!
● Collect multiplier badges to boost your score!
● Earn 4 medals: Bronze, Silver, Gold (hard), Platinum (very hard)
● Challenge your friends and family on Game Center
● Share your highest scores on Twitter
● Play on up to 9 different tennis courts!

Not into tennis? Check out Tiny Goalie, Tiny Striker and Tiny Touchdown, also available to download on the App Store.

Check out our bubblicious new game Bubble Heroes http://bit.ly/bubbleheroes
